items.text_for_match: Emery's triple change fires Villa to victory at Chelsea Match of the Day's Wayne Rooney analyses why Unai Emery's second-half substitutions were so impactful as Aston Villa came from a goal down to beat Chelsea 2-1 at Stamford Bridge. Match of the Day's Wayne Rooney analyses why Unai Emery's second-half substitutions were so impactful as Aston Villa came from a goal down to beat Chelsea 2-1 at Stamford Bridge.

items.ja: Villa will not speak about league target until game 34 - Emery
items.en: Villa will not speak about league target until game 34 - Emery
items.text_for_match: Villa will not speak about league target until game 34 - Emery Aston Villa manager Unai Emery insists it is still too early to say whether his side is in contention for the Premier League title despite being third in the table after their 2-1 victory against Chelsea. Aston Villa manager Unai Emery insists it is still too early to say whether his side is in contention for the Premier League title despite being third in the table after their 2-1 victory against Chelsea.

items.ja: Equaliser changed dynamic of game - Maresca
items.en: Equaliser changed dynamic of game - Maresca
items.text_for_match: Equaliser changed dynamic of game - Maresca Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca says that his side dominated the game in the first hour but were unable to respond to the shift in dynamics after they conceded the first goal to Aston Villa. Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca says that his side dominated the game in the first hour but were unable to respond to the shift in dynamics after they conceded the first goal to Aston Villa.

items.ja: How releasing Reijnders gave Man City win at Forest
items.en: How releasing Reijnders gave Man City win at Forest
items.text_for_match: How releasing Reijnders gave Man City win at Forest Match of the Day's Alan Shearer analyses the half-time tactical tweak from Manchester City which released Tijani Reijnders into attacking areas and gave City a vital 2-1 win at Nottingham Forest. items.ja: Arsenal should have won by more - Arteta
items.en: Arsenal should have won by more - Arteta
items.text_for_match: Arsenal should have won by more - Arteta Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta say his team's next step is to capitalise on their chances more and create bigger scorelines after a 2-1 win against Brighton. items.ja: The best wonderkids outside big five leagues
items.en: The best wonderkids outside big five leagues
items.text_for_match: The best wonderkids outside big five leagues There are plenty of wonderkids catching the eye outside of Europe's big-five leagues - BBC Sport takes a look at the top 10 as ranked by the CIES Football Observatory research group. items.ja: Jota's sons to join mascots for Liverpool v Wolves

items.ja: EFL Quiz of the Year: Who has been breaking records in 2025?
items.en: EFL Quiz of the Year: Who has been breaking records in 2025?
items.text_for_match: EFL Quiz of the Year: Who has been breaking records in 2025? From record-breakers to dire financial situations, there's been much to talk about in the English Football League in 2025 - but do you remember the finer details?
